name: ts-battleship
description: This is the classic game of battleship.  It is a full-stack web application writtin in TypeScript. It follows object-oriented design patterns and principals. It was inspired by [this design](https://www.cs.nmsu.edu/~rth/cs/cs187/f97/battleshipdesign.html) and [SOLID Principles](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SOLID).

scripts.heroku-prebuild: npm install --prefix server --production=false && npm install --prefix client --production=false
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd ./server && npm start --prod && cd ../client && npm run build --prod

author: Drew Cook
